title: A Blue Sky
description: A Blue Sky is a raw and powerful collection of 16 fictional short stories that touch the hard subjects in life â€“ grief, mental illness, body image issues, sexual abuse, eating disorders, infidelity, relationship issues and death. Subjects that exist in many communities but are rarely addressed with such understanding and intimacy.Natasha's collection, written over a ten-year period, create a powerful and thought-provoking read.
author: Natasha Jennings
